title: Wallet Event Schema
description: Schema definition for wallet-related notification events.

event_key.description: A unique key for the wallet event (e.g. wallet.deposit_success).

description.description: Optional human-readable description of the event.

roles.description: Roles eligible to receive this wallet event notification.

fallback_message.description: Fallback message used if templating fails or no template is set.

template_key.description: Template reference key, used for rendering notification messages.

enabled.description: Whether this notification event is active.
